title: Application error
body: Game randomly closes down during matches, will repeat the crash after the first one for the majority of the time. Does not occur every game.

replies.body:
I can imagine how incredibly inconvenient and frustrating this may be. Hopefully we can work with you to resolve this issue asap! Can you start by trying the solutions listed here and let me know how that goes?

http://helpdeskgeek.com/help-desk/instruction-at-referenced-memory-could-not-be-read/

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=Mg7qg3zA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-19T21:32:20.829+0000)
>
> I can imagine how incredibly inconvenient and frustrating this may be. Hopefully we can work with you to resolve this issue asap! Can you start by trying the solutions listed here and let me know how that goes?
> 
> http://helpdeskgeek.com/help-desk/instruction-at-referenced-memory-could-not-be-read/

I have followed most of the do-able steps and none seem to have changed the outcome. If it helps my sound of everything running will cut out for a second just before the game closes
